definition: CRT used in TV or computer monitor/picture tube/kinescope
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: The invention of hyperplane kinescopes is another technical innovation.
sentences.chinese: 显像管的发明是又一次技术革新。

sentences.english: Quality control of color picture tubes may require the salvage and reuse of the glass envelopes .
sentences.chinese: 彩色显像管的质量控制需要利用和回用玻璃泡废料。

sentences.english: The new kinescope has a revolving power of 800 lines.
sentences.chinese: 新型显像管有旋转800线圈的功能。

sentences.english: It is helpful for evaluating the quality of different products to understand those concepts.
sentences.chinese: 掌握这些概念有助于正确评价显像管的质量。

sentences.english: Electrons also flow in a television, where they are made to hit the screen, causing a flash of light.
sentences.chinese: 电子也流入电视显像管，撞击荧光屏，产生闪光。

definition: to mount an electronic valve/to plug in a bulb
case, casing, cabinet or housing (of a computer, photocopier etc)
